$body = $("body");
$body.addClass("loading");
$body.removeClass("loading");


<div class="modal">
    <!-- Place at bottom of page -->
</div>
<style>
    .modal {
    display:    none;
    position:   fixed;
    z-index:    1000;
    top:        0;
    left:       0;
    height:     100%;
    width:      100%;
    background: rgba( 255, 255, 255, .8 )
    url('data:image/gif;base64,')
    50% 50%
    no-repeat;
    }

    body.loading {
    overflow: hidden;
    }

    body.loading .modal {
    display: block;
    }
  </style>
